title: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City — The Definitive Edition (Mobile)
headline: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City —The Definitive Edition (Mobile)
subtitle: Scan the QR Code to Download
content:
Welcome to the 1980s. From the decade of big hair and pastel suits comes the story of one man’s rise to the top of the criminal pile.

Scan the QR Code to learn how to play Grand Theft Auto: Vice City — The Definitive Edition on your mobile device for free as part of your GTA+ Membership.
